The reason why the ISS is at 51.6 degrees is that between the the inclinations used by the US (28) and russia (51.6), russia's inclination traverses a much greater area. The reason why russia uses 51.6 instead of 46 because they don't want the rocket to travel over a large swath of Mongolia and china as there would be complaints about spent boosters or failed rockets crashing in their territory, as when this occurs, explosions and/or hydrazine / N2O4 contamination may follow.
